## v0.2.0

    1. Moved all website files to the `docs/` folder so that the root folder can be used for analytical code. (see [nhspy-plotthedots](https://github.com/nhs-pycom/nhspy-plotthedots) for an example project)
    2. Changed the font to `[open-sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans)` open font.
    3. Added [bootstrap icons](https://icons.getbootstrap.com/).
    4. Added blog fuction and [giscus comments](https://github.com/giscus/giscus).
    5. Added drop down menues to top bar
    6. Added Quarto `.css` for hero banner and buttons
    7. Added auto publish all `.qmd` files in `tutorials/` and `documentation/` folders
